name: Marvin The Hatter
description: Marvin The Hatter - this is the story of a boy caught in his nightmares, who is trying to get out of them and understand who dragged him into them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
